Alfred Henrickson

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Jacob and Mary Keber
  3. Location of Family: Spalding, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Columbus, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 3
  7. Date of Birth: 1909-11-01, Brooklyn, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1986-01-11, Grand Island, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Spouse Name: Benedicta Hendrickson
  11. Source: Spalding Enterprise, 23 January 1986; Grand Island Independent, 17 May 1912; Spalding Newspaper, 16 May 1912; National Orphan Train Complex; "St. Michael's Parish 1886-1986," p. 58-59, 259.
